title: 3 Easy Ways to Add Other Accounts to Gmail: Mobile & Desktop

steps.title: Open the Gmail app.
steps.content: Open the Gmail app. Gmail is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . [1] X Research source This method will add another email address to view within the Gmail app. This can be another Gmail account or an email account from a different provider.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture in the top-right.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture in the top-right. This will open a new menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add another account.
steps.content: Tap Add another account . This will be above Manage accounts on this device . [3] X Research source A new window will open.

steps.title: Select the account you want to add.
steps.content: Select the account you want to add. You may need to tap Continue . You can choose: Google iCloud Outlook , Hotmail , and Live Office365 Yahoo Other (IMAP)

steps.title: Enter your login information.
steps.content: Enter your login information. You'll be taken to the login screen of the email you entered. This screen will vary depending on your email provider. After logging in, Gmail will begin to connect your email to the app.

steps.title: Enter a name and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter a name and tap Next . This is the name that will be displayed on sent messages. Your email will now be connected to the Gmail app.

steps.title: Log into https://mail.google.com/ in your web browser.
steps.content: Log into https://mail.google.com/ in your web browser. Use the Gmail account you want as your main email. [4] X Research source If needed, you can create a Gmail account to use Gmail . This method will add another email address to view within the Gmail website. This can be another Gmail account or an email account from a different provider.

steps.title: Click Settings in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Click Settings in the top-right corner. This will open a new window.

steps.title: Click See all settings.
steps.content: Click See all settings . You can find this underneath Quick settings . You'll be redirected to your Settings page.

steps.title: Click Accounts and Import.
steps.content: Click Accounts and Import . This will be next to Inbox .

steps.title: Click Add a mail account.
steps.content: Click Add a mail account . This will be next to Check mail from other accounts: . With this option, you'll be able to see the mail of other email addresses within your Gmail account. A new window will open.

steps.title: Enter the email address you want to add, then click Next.
steps.content: Enter the email address you want to add, then click Next . You can use most email accounts. If needed, you can create a new one .

steps.title: Select Link accounts with Gmailify.
steps.content: Select Link accounts with Gmailify . With Gmailify, you can keep both email addresses but manage emails from both using only your Gmail inbox. You can also select Import emails from my other account (POP3) if you want to import emails to Gmail .

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . You'll be taken to the login screen of the email you entered. This screen will vary depending on your email.

steps.title: Log into your email.
steps.content: Log into your email. Use the new window to sign into the email you want to link. Gmail will ask for permission to access your email address, information, and mail.

steps.title: Click Agree.
steps.content: Click Agree . You'll receive a success screen when the linking is complete. You can click Close once the accounts are linked. You'll be able to view emails from both email addresses in your Inbox .

steps.title: Open https://mail.google.com/mail/ in a web browser or the Gmail app.
steps.content: Open https://mail.google.com/mail/ in a web browser or the Gmail app. Make sure you're already logged in to the accounts you want to swap between.

steps.title: Click your profile picture in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Click your profile picture in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click a connected account.
steps.content: Click a connected account. You'll see the accounts on your device listened below Manage your Google Account . Clicking an account will switch you to its mailbox. With the Gmail app, tap â˜° at the top-left corner, then All Inboxes to see emails from all connected accounts at once.
